org.openntf.domino.thread

Class DominoReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ref.Reference<T>
      • java.lang.ref.WeakReference<Object>
        • org.openntf.domino.thread.DominoReference

  • public class DominoReference
extends WeakReference<Object>
    Author:
    praml DominoReference tracks the lifetime of reference object and recycles delegate if reference object is GCed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DominoReference(long key, Object reference, lotus.domino.Base delegate, ReferenceQueue<Object> q)
      Instantiates a new domino reference.

      boolean equals(Object obj)
      A WeakValue is equal to another WeakValue iff they both refer to objects that are, in turn, equal according to their own equals methods.
      int hashCode() 
      void setNoRecycle(boolean what)
      Prevents that the delegate object will be really recycled.

                       Object reference,

    • Method Detail

      • setNoRecycle

        public void setNoRecycle(boolean what)
        Prevents that the delegate object will be really recycled. Autorecycle counting is done. - So you must ensure that you recycle the document yourself or wrap it again
        Parameters:
        what - The object to set to not recycle.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object obj)
        A WeakValue is equal to another WeakValue iff they both refer to objects that are, in turn, equal according to their own equals methods. Key is not checked here, because there might be "dummy" values without a key so that "contains" works
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object
